text: Nne ngabhoneje itendi yabhonji nngabha ya malinga shiikupinjikwa nkweli ya Ngani ja Mmbone, gunaabhalanjile a Kepa pa bhandu bhowe kuti, “Monaga mwe Mmayaudi nkutama mwiikubho ya bhandunji bhangajalukanga, na mbuti nngabha Nnyaudi, pakuti nnakwakwikwilishiyanga bhalinginji nngabha Bhayaudi kukagulila ikubho ya Shiyaudi?”
